name: Life After Us: The System
description:
Life After Us is a series of short horror games based in a universe inspired by the stories of Edgar Allan Poe and HP Lovecraft.

The System, the second in the series sees you tasked with locating a young woman who suffers from a mental illness.

She is believed to have returned to Hawthorn Sanitarium where she was once a patient. It is here your search begins.
